t: Bank on Amazon? Reports suggest e-commerce giant wants to handle Americans' finances
s: We already have Amazon on our nightstands and kitchen counters, in our pantries and our TVs — why not in our wallets, as well? Experts weighed in Monday on a Wall Street Journal report that Amazon is looking into offering bank-like financial products, possibly with a partner like JPMorgan Chase.
